content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our 3-ply masks are specifically developed for every day comfortable use. This 3-ply mask is made of non-woven material that is both breathable and comfortable. This mask offers protection against dust, automobile exhaust, pollen, and more.

  • Available in regular packaging or sterile-packaged surgical grade
  • Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE) > 98%
  • Multi-Layer filtering effectively blocks dust and other PM2.5 in the air
  • Upgraded Elastic Ear Band, ultra-comfortable to wear.
  • Individually Adjustable Nose Clip for Excellent Fit

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73895,73879,73892″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1592582899439{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

3 Ply Mask

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our masks are made of high-quality cotton and non-woven filter cloth, and adopt a 3-ply structure. The outer ply is made by moderately thick and flexible non-woven fabric to resist dusts and ashes. The middle ply is made up from a melt-down BFE95 material to stop microbes and particulate substances. The inner ply made by ultrafine fiber is skin friendly and dam proof.

The elastic ear loop was tested thoroughly and holds up for every day wear, ensuring no excess pressure to the ears. Our masks are made of environmentally friendly material and are moisture-proof, non-toxic, non-irritating, soft and comfortable. 3-Ply non-woven design ensures comfort and breathability to keep you protected for longer.

Part # 203-001[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc035-e168c7bb-371f”][vc_column_text]Our 3 Ply Masks are FDA and CE approved. They conform to EU 20161425, and are EN149:201+A1:2009 compliant.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
